## Data of gas generation by different microbial consortia in 4 biodegradation experiments {.smaller}
###Aims:  
 - to blot data data and to evaluate data with different models, to estimate the speed, maximum rate and the lag phase of methanogenesis.

## We fit the data of experiment 26 with linear function
x1 <- Tabel[, 1]  
y1 <- Tabel[, 2]  
lineaarne_mudel <- nls(y ~ b*x1 + d)  
summary(lineaarne_mudel)  

### Let us plot the fitted experimental data
b <- 0.1771  
d <- 0.4629  
x <-  0:70   
y <- b * x + d  
plot(y~x, type="l", xlab = "Time, days", ylab = "Methan, mL/g", 
    ylim = c(-5, 15)) 

## Fitted the data of experiment 26 with linear function {.flexbox .vcenter}

![](Katse26_lineaarne.png)

## We fit the data of experiment 26 with square function
x1 <- Tabel[, 1]  
y1 <- Tabel[, 2]  
ruut_mudel <- nls(y ~ a*x1*x1 + b*x1 + d)  
summary(ruut_mudel)  

### Let us plot the fitted experimental data
a <- -0.4909  
b <- 3.1927  
d <- -3.0436  
x <-  0:70  
y <-  a * x * x + b * x + d  
plot(y ~ x, type = "l",xlab = "Time, days",ylab = "Methan mL/g",ylim = c(-2500, 5))

## Fitted the data of experiment 26 with sqare function {.flexbox .vcenter}

![](Katse26_ruutfunktsioon.png)

##  We fit the data of experiment 26 with logistic function from easynls package
(7 = "y~a*(1+b*(exp(-c*x)))^-1" logistic)  
x1 <- Tabel[, 1]  
y1 <- Tabel[, 2]  
data <- data.frame(x1,y1)  
nlsplot(data, model = 7, start = c(a = 1, b = 1, c = 1, d = 1, e = 1),  
        xlab = "Explanatory Variable" , ylab = "Response Variable", position = 1)  
summary(model.nls)
